headline: Ball Corporation to Present at Bank of America's 2026 Global Agriculture and Materials Conference
summary: Ball Corporation (NYSE:BALL), the leading global provider of sustainable aluminum packaging for beverages, personal and home care products, will present at the Bank of America 2026 Global Agriculture and Materials Conference on February 26, 2026.

headline: Appaloosa Management Takes New Stake In Ball Corp Of 1.2M Shares; Sells Stake In Truist, Western Alliance Bancorp, Zions Bancorp
